
```{r}
library(Hotelling)
A <- matrix(c(194, 208, 233, 241, 265, 269,
               192, 188, 217, 222, 252, 283,
               141, 165, 171, 201, 207, 191), nrow = 3, byrow = TRUE)

# 乙品牌轮胎数据
B <- matrix(c(239, 189, 224, 243, 243, 226,
               127, 105, 123, 123, 117, 125,
               90, 85, 79, 110, 100, 75), nrow = 3, byrow = TRUE)

# 将数据转换为数据框形式
A_df <- as.data.frame(t(A))
B_df <- as.data.frame(t(B))
colnames(A_df) <- c("阶段1", "阶段2", "阶段3")
colnames(B_df) <- c("阶段1", "阶段2", "阶段3")

# 进行Hotelling's T^2检验
result <- hotelling.test(A_df, B_df)
print(result)
```
